portfolioItems.title: Naszownik
portfolioItems.description: Dictionary of the Cieszyn Silesian dialect featuring a search bar and quiz functionality with adjustable difficulty settings. Built with vanilla JavaScript on top of the Astro meta framework, and styled using Tailwind CSS due to its intuitive approach to styling and growing popularity in the development community.

portfolioItems.title: michalwierzgon.dev
portfolioItems.description: One-page portfolio created to showcase projects and track progress in learning front-end development. The main objective of this project was to build a simple one-page portfolio, utilizing best practices in SCSS, enhancing skills in its use, while also practicing React, creating a responsive design, and improving UX/UI expertise.
